testimonials.content: A great SEO, dedicated to his work and his clients. Maximillian communicates a lot and really helped us on this quick white hat link building mission. I would have no problem in recommending him to anyone serious about their rankings ! Thanks again

Maxx did a great job with what I needed. I was really impressed with the quality of what he did, how flexible he was in taking that and making it exactly to the specs that I needed, and how fast he did it. I will be hiring him again in the near future for any web dev needs.
Highly recommend Maximillian!  Great communication, quick execution, and solid results.
Very knowledgeable. Really helped me get an understanding of how to rank my website.
Max was gr eat in making what was impossible, possible. He was patient with us when we needed time for communication/decisions and quick to act when called upon. Great Work!

The fact that we're having to hire staff to handle all the extra business is a testament to all the awesome work Maxx did for us. Honestly, we get alot of traffic/new patients from google alone! We are super impressed!
